title: Vegetable tortilla lasagne
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '2 medium carrots, diced', '1 medium onion, diced', '1 red pepper, diced', '1 green pepper, diced', '3 cloves garlic, chopped finely', '1 medium courgette, diced', '140g (5 oz) small button mushrooms, sliced', '400g tin chopped tomatoes', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon sugar', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '2 tablespoons Worcester sauce', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 vegetable stock cube', '4 large flour tortillas, trimmed to fit your dish', 'Cheese sauce', '40g (1 1/2 oz) butter', '40g (1 1/2 oz) plain flour', '1 pinch grated nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon Dijon mustard', '1 pinch black pepper', '300ml (1/2 pt) milk', '100g (3 1/2 oz) soft cheese', '55g (2 oz) strong cheese spread (like Seriously Strong), optional', '100g (3 1/2 oz) cheese, grated']
